meanings.definition: Covered with or characterized by mucus.
meanings.sent1: The sick child's nose was so mucid that he needed a tissue.
meanings.sent2: The mucid substance on the floor made it slippery.
meanings.sent3: The mucid slime on the frog made it hard for him to hop around.
meanings.sent4: The mucid feeling of the wet mud squishing between my toes was unpleasant.
meanings.sent5: The mucid mucus dripping from the tree branch looked like a strange decoration.

meanings.sent1: The mucid jellyfish felt slippery to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The mucid glue made it hard to separate the papers.
meanings.sent3: The mucid texture of the pudding made it hard to eat with a fork.
meanings.sent4: The mucid feeling of the wet seaweed wrapped around my leg was unsettling.
meanings.sent5: The mucid slime on the banana peel caused a slippery mess on the floor.
